name: Orangeade
description: A refreshing change from lemonade. If you don't care for pulp in your drink, feel free to strain the juice before you add it to the water.
directions: Bring 2 cups water and sugar to a boil in a small saucepan.
Cook at a boil for 3 minutes, stirring to dissolve sugar, and creating a simple syrup.
Combine simple syrup, 6 cups water, orange juice, and lemon juice in a large pitcher; refrigerate until cold.
